mapper.select: SELECT PACKAGE_NO , PACKAGE_NAME , AVAILABLE_START_DATE , AVAILABLE_END_DATE , PACKAGE_STATUS , PACK_CHANGE_NAME , PACK_IMG_PATH FROM PACKAGE_INFO WHERE PACKAGE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PACKAGE_NO DESC
SELECT PACKAGE_NO , PACKAGE_NAME , PACKAGE_PRICE , AVAILABLE_START_DATE , AVAILABLE_END_DATE , PRODUCT_COMPOSIT , PACKAGE_SET , PACKAGE_STATUS FROM PACKAGE_INFO WHERE PACKAGE_NO = #{packageNo}
SELECT PACKAGE_NO, PACKAGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PACKAGE_NO, PACKAGE_NAME FROM PACKAGE_INFO WHERE PACKAGE_NO < #{packageNo} ORDER BY PACKAGE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT PACKAGE_NO, PACKAGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PACKAGE_NO, PACKAGE_NAME FROM PACKAGE_INFO WHERE PACKAGE_NO > #{packageNo} ORDER BY PACKAGE_NO ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PACKAGE_NO , PACKAGE_NAME , AVAILABLE_START_DATE , AVAILABLE_END_DATE , PACKAGE_STATUS , PACK_CHANGE_NAME , PACK_IMG_PATH FROM PACKAGE_INFO WHERE PACKAGE_SET = #{packageSet} ORDER BY PACKAGE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PACKAGE_RESERV(PACKAGE_RESERV_NO , CHECK_IN_DATE , CHECK_OUT_DATE , TID , PAY_DATE , MEMBER_NO , PACKAGE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_PACKAGE_RESERV_NO.NEXTVAL , #{checkInDate} , #{checkOutDate} , #{tid} , SYSDATE , #{memberNo} , #{packageNo})
mapper.select: SELECT PR.PACKAGE_RESERV_NO AS packageReservNo, PR.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, PR.PACKAGE_NO AS packageNo, PR.CHECK_IN_DATE AS checkInDate, PR.CHECK_OUT_DATE AS checkOutDate, PI.PACKAGE_NAME AS packageName, PI.PACKAGE_PRICE AS packagePrice FROM PACKAGE_RESERV PR JOIN PACKAGE_INFO PI ON PR.PACKAGE_NO = PI.PACKAGE_NO WHERE PR.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT PR.PACKAGE_RESERV_NO AS packageReservNo, PR.CHECK_IN_DATE AS checkInDate, PR.CHECK_OUT_DATE AS checkOutDate, PR.TID AS tid, PR.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, PR.PACKAGE_NO AS packageNo, PI.PACKAGE_NAME AS packageName, PI.PACKAGE_PRICE AS packagePrice FROM PACKAGE_RESERV PR JOIN PACKAGE_INFO PI ON PR.PACKAGE_NO = PI.PACKAGE_NO WHERE PR.PACKAGE_RESERV_NO = #{packageReservNo}

SELECT B.PACKAGE_NAME , B.PACKAGE_PRICE , A.PACKAGE_RESERV_NO , A.CHECK_IN_DATE , A.CHECK_OUT_DATE , A.TID , A.PAY_DATE , A.PREFUND_STATUS , A.PREFUND_DATE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PACKAGE_NO FROM PACKAGE_RESERV A JOIN PACKAGE_INFO B ON (A.PACKAGE_NO = B.PACKAGE_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PACKAGE_RESERV SET PREFUND_STATUS = 'Y' , PREFUND_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE PACKAGE_RESERV_NO = #{packageReserveNo} AND PREFUND_STATUS = 'N'
